This page contains a series of formulas and references for paediatric vital signs, drug doses, and equipment sizing.

With the exception of formulas, the source data for these tables is the source data for the Millipaed app — what you see here is exactly what the app uses. This makes it easy to spot any errors in the underlying values, as well as doubling as a standalone reference. As the tables are auto-generated, they're a bit rough around the edges — apologies for the formatting.

:::
